name: Pizza
description: A savory dish with a dough base, traditionally topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and various other ingredients.

name: Cheeseburger
description: A hamburger topped with cheese, typically served with lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, bacon, or chiles.

name: Sushi
description: A dish featuring vinegared rice paired with various toppings and fillings, such as seafood and vegetables.

name: Taco
description: A traditional Mexican dish consisting of small hand-sized corn or wheat tortillas topped with a filling.

name: Peking Duck
description: A famous Beijing dish known for its thin, crispy skin, served with pancakes, spring onions, and hoisin sauce.

name: Tandoori Chicken
description: Chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, then cooked in a tandoor, a cylindrical clay oven.

name: Pad Thai
description: A stir-fried rice noodle dish commonly served as street food, typically with shrimp or chicken.

name: Paella
description: A Valencian rice dish with ancient roots that typically includes rice, saffron, chicken, and seafood.

name: Croissant
description: A buttery, flaky pastry named for its crescent shape, associated with French breakfasts.

name: Moussaka
description: An eggplant- or potato-based casserole dish, often including ground meat and b√©chamel sauce.

name: Baklava
description: A rich, sweet dessert pastry made of layers of filo filled with chopped nuts and sweetened with syrup or honey.

name: Belgian Waffles
description: A variety of waffle with a lighter batter, larger squares, and deeper pockets than ordinary American waffles.

name: Fish and Chips
description: A hot dish consisting of fried fish in batter served with chips, traditionally eaten with salt and vinegar.

name: Feijoada
description: A stew of beans with beef and pork, considered the national dish of Brazil.

name: Hummus
description: A spread made from cooked, mashed chickpeas blended with tahini, lemon juice, and garlic.

name: Kimchi
description: A traditional side dish of salted and fermented vegetables, such as napa cabbage and Korean radish.

name: Tagine
description: A North African Maghreb dish named after the earthenware pot in which it is cooked, often with meat and vegetables.

name: Vegemite Sandwich
description: A sandwich spread with Vegemite, a thick, black Australian food spread made from leftover brewers' yeast extract.

name: Sauerbraten
description: A pot roast, usually of beef (but other meats such as lamb, mutton, pork, and traditionally, horse), marinated before slow cooking.

name: Pho
description: A Vietnamese soup consisting of broth, rice noodles, herbs, and meat, primarily made with either beef or chicken.
